channel.title: Talks on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Speaking
item.description:
I speak at conferences and local meetups. Here’s a list of my most recent engagements. Want me to talk at your event? Get in touch!

  • Future Decoded 2016: Python Tools for Visual Studio
  • PyConUK 2016: Cerberus, Data Validation for Humans
  • PyterPy 2016: Eve, REST APIs for Humans
  • PyCon Italy 2016: Cerberus, Data Validation for Humans (video, Italian)
  • PyCon Italy 2016: Web Framework Royal Rumble
  • Western Europe MVP Open Day 2016: Real Life .NET Cross Platform
  • OpenDomus.net Communities Meetup: Real Life .NET Cross Platform
  • Microsoft TecHeroes: Real Life .NET Cross Platform (Italian)
  • Microsoft Best of Build: Bash on Ubuntu on Windows (Italian)
  • Microsoft TecHeroes: Vim for Visual Studio (Italian)
  • Microsoft TecHeroes: Python Tools for Visual Studio (Italian)
  • Microsoft TecHeroes: CoderDoojo Coding Club for Kids (Italian)
  • Persona Live 2015: Eve, REST APIs for Humans
  • EuroPython 2014: Eve, REST APIs for Humans
  • PyCon Italy 2014: Eve, REST APIs for Humans
  • PyCon Sweden 2014: Eve, REST APIs for Humans
  • Python Meetup: Eve, REST APIs for Humans
  • FOSDEM 2014: Eve, REST APIs for Humans
  • RomagnaCamp 2013: We Are All Remote Workers
  • NoSQL Day 2013: RESTful Web API and MongoDB go for a picnic
  • MongoTorino 2013: RESTful Web API and MongoDB go for a picnic
  • A Morning With MongoDB: RESTful Web API and MongoDB go for a picnic
  • EuroPython 2012: Developing RESTful Web APIs with Python, Flask and MongoDB
  • Agenda Digitale Ravenna 2014: CoderDojo Romagna
  • Cultura d’Impresa 2.0: Online / Offline
  • Liceo Artistico Severini (Ravenna): Identit√† Reale, Virtuale e Digitale
  • Liceo Artistico Severini (Ravenna): Personal Branding per Studenti e non solo
  • KnowCamp 2011: Fuga dalla Comfort Zone
  • RomagnaCamp 2011: Quattro passi tra le nuvole
